message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to provide a 10% discount if you buy this product within the next 5 rounds. If you don't buy within the 5 rounds, the discount will expire.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'll take the product at the discounted price.

However, I'll also offer you the option to wait and see if you can get a better deal on the next round. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a free accessory worth $500.
